means the document itself produced for inspection of the court.‚Äù  As mentioned
above,  no  such  title  deed  was  produced  in  court,  nor  was  any  application
made to lead secondary evidence regarding a deed purported to transfer the
rights of the 4thdefendant to the 9th and 10th defendants.

I
n the above circumstances, if the Learned District Judge chose to disregard
the admitted facts of the parties, it should have been clearly justified, giving
reasons  in  the  judgment.  A  mistake  or  inadvertence  on  the  part  of  the
District Judge should not prejudice the rights of the parties.
